CONDITION_X.description_1: The chime will sound when a switching command is transmitted. If a delay is set the function will be executed after the time has expired.
CONDITION_X.descrHint: You can define a time for sending a switching command via the switch actuator at the corresponding channel.

KEY.description_1: With a short or long button press the chime will be triggered according to the selected mode.
KEY.group_description_1: If the chime sounds accidentally it can be turned off with this button.
KEY.group_description_2: With a short or long button press the chime will be triggered according to the selected mode.

MOTION_DETECTOR.description_1:
The chime will sound when the motion detector is triggered. If a delay time is set, the function will be executed after the time has expired.

The transmission interval of the motion detector (channel parameter) should be set to dynamic and the minimum transmission interval should be 15s .

PULSE_SENSOR.description_1: The chime will sound when a switching command is transmitted. If a delay is set the function will be executed after the time has expired.

SENSOR_WINDOW.description_1: When the window is operated the chime will be triggered according to the selected operating mode.
SENSOR_WINDOW.description_2: This direct link will be deactivated.

SHUTTER_CONTACT.description_1: When the contact is operated the chime will be triggered according to the selected operating mode.

SMOKE_DETECTOR_TEAM.description_1: The chime will be activated when the smoke detector is triggered.

SMOKE_DETECTOR_TEAM_V2.description_1: The chime will be activated when the smoke detector is triggered.

SWITCH_INTERFACE.description_1: By pressing the switch contact the chime will be triggered according to the selected mode.

TILT_SENSOR.description_1: When the switch contact is operated the chime will be triggered according to the selected operating mode.

VIRTUAL_KEY.description_1: With a long or short button press the chime will sound. If a delay is set the function will be executed after the time has expired.

WATERDETECTIONSENSOR.description_1: In case of humidity the chime will be triggered according to the selected direction.
